Description: Wonderful 4BR 2BA apartment for rent in Brighton's Oak Square area. This unit features finished hardwood flooring. Wood accent molding around the windows. Built in bookcase/hutch. Eat in Kitchen with white cabinets and countertops. White appliances with dishwasher! Balcony/deck. Laundry located in building.
